title: @Riot Kades will there be an option for wave 1 buyers to get the updated rulebook
body: I was wondering as according to some people on bgg there are some difference between the wave 1 and wave 2 rulebooks.  Are you guys planning on allowing wave 1 guys to purchase (my prefrence)  or download the wave 2 rulebook

replies.body: We will be providing digital downloads of the most recent rulebooks, but our plan - similar to League - is to keep updating it as needed.  With that in mind, I'm not sure if it makes sense to print extra rulebooks after each iteration.  But the plan is to give you access to each iteration.

I know someone has already asked in another post, but since there is no chance of an expansion or sequel in the near future do you think it would be possible to release assets for the community to make fan-made content? We all love the game and I think that could be a good way of maintaining an active fanbase for it. It has plenty of replay value as is but if it is really set in stone that there will never be a sequel it'd be great if the community could get going on making their own stuff.
But there made so nice even if it was pod for rulebooks id pay to keep the quality.
I wonder what's the new update in the Rule Books?

https://boardgamegeek.com/filepage/143267/english-rulebook-wave-2
the second part is the updated rules specifically
iirc, Kades said (on BGG), there would be a rules update available as a .pdf
